page.title: 02THE SOUTH DOWNS
page.content: THE DOWNS ARE AN IMPORTANT PART OF THE AREA.THEY ARE A DESIGNATED AREA OF OUTSTANDING NATURAL BEAUTY AND PART IS CALLED THE EASTBOURNE HERITAGE DOWNLAND. THE DOWNS ARE PATROLLED BY RANGERS WHO MAKE SURE YOU DON'T RUIN THEM. FARMERS GROW BARLEY AS A MAIN CROP ALTHOUGH THEY ALSO HAVE SHEEP AND CATTLE GRAZING.THERE ARE MANY TRACKS AND PATHWAYS ON THE DOWNS THE MOST IMPORTANT OF THEM IS THE SOUTH DOWNS WAY.UNFORTUNATELY SOME PEOPLE RIDE MOTORBIKES OVER THE DOWNS WHICH DESTROYS THE PEACE. MAN HAS LIVED ON THE DOWNS SINCE THE STONE AGE AND YOU CAN FIND THE REMAINS OF HIS BURIAL MOUNDS AND FIELDS WHERE HE GREW HIS CROPS. HE ALSO GREW BARLEY.
